entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as looking down at her plate of food and refusing to eat another bite. She is also referred to by Ron as 'Er-my-knee'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as accidentally spraying Harry with bits of Yorkshire pudding while trying to get Hermione to eat.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is referred to by Ron and is the one who gets sprayed with bits of Yorkshire pudding.

relationships.description: Ron tries to convince Hermione to eat her dinner.
Harry gets sprayed with bits of Yorkshire pudding by Ron.
